Structure.Feedback: The model evaluation should be taught together with classification algorithms; Group project and presentation should be merged all together for 40%.

Coverage.Feedback: I will talk more about Neural Networks and Deep learning, as well as recent techniques like generative models, LLMs, etc.

Accessibility.Feedback: No technology, skills, and background requirements are listed.

Appropriateness.Feedback: Should start with motivations of a concept/technique - for example, "why do we need data mining?" with examples

Accuracy.Feedback: Should talk about recent AI applciations like ChatGPT and how it is benefitted from Data Mining

Coherence.Feedback: Content a bit repetitive, I want to use an easy tone in the beginning of the course

Engagement.Feedback: No clear examples and explanations on the example, also I need coherent or up-to-date examples

Variety.Feedback: We should use new, non-repetitive examples/questions not mentioned in the slides, but closely related to them
